General.Name: Ruida Futures
General.Description: Ruida Futures Co.,Ltd. operates as a futures company in China. The company engages in futures brokerage, asset and fund management, futures investment consulting, risk management, and financial services and public offering fund businesses, as well as operates as a stockbroker. It serves industrial and high-net-worth customers, enterprises, and institutional and individual investors. The company was formerly known as Futures Brokerage Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Ruida Futures Co., Ltd. in November 2012. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Xiamen, China. Ruida Futures Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Xiamen Jianuo Industrial Co., Ltd.
General.Address: No.169, Tapu East Road, Xiamen, China, 361000
